Reviews.Title: CHEAP RUSTY CAMERA MOUNTS IN 3 MONTHS
Reviews.Author: Banner Joseph
Reviews.Content: These camera mounts were included in an outdoor CCTV DVR camera kit with 12 cameras.  Within three months they were completely rusted.  Do not buy these if any humidity can get to them.  Live in Texas and we have not had rain more than twice this year.

Reviews.Title: Great Product for the price
Reviews.Author: rfate
Reviews.Content: This mount can be adjusted in just about any position.  It is all metal (not like most mounts) and is very compact.  It is excellent for the price.
